definitions.definition: A state of floating , or being afloat .
The ability (as of a tire or snowshoes) to stay on the surface of soft ground or snow.
A process of separating minerals by agitating a mixture with water and detergents etc; selected substances being carried to the surface in air bubbles .
The launching onto the market of a tranche of stocks or shares , usually a new issue.

main_definition: A state of floating , or being afloat .
secondary_definitions: The ability (as of a tire or snowshoes) to stay on the surface of soft ground or snow.
( mining , chemical engineering ) A process of separating minerals by agitating a mixture with water and detergents etc; selected substances being carried to the surface in air bubbles .
( British , finance ) The launching onto the market of a tranche of stocks or shares , usually a new issue.
